setTypeFileFilter

loadFile

public FileIDE loadFile()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Load a theory from an input device, typically a file.

Returns:
the loaded theory as an alice.tuprolog.Theory object, or null if the operation is cancelled.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong.

saveFileAs

public FileIDE saveFileAs(FileIDE fileIDE)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Save the engine's current theory to an output device, typically a file.

Returns:
The identifier of the output device where the theory has been saved (i.e. a filename if the output device is a file), or null if the operation is cancelled.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong.
